solution_line_template: In total, there are {num_people} x {pieces_per_pizza} = <<{num_people}*{pieces_per_pizza}={total_pizza_pieces}>>{total_pizza_pieces} pizza pieces.

Bill and Dale eat {num_people_group1} x {pieces_per_pizza} x {percent_eaten_group1_num}% = <<{num_people_group1}*{pieces_per_pizza}*{percent_eaten_group1_num}*{percent_factor}={pieces_eaten_group1}>>{pieces_eaten_group1} pieces.

Ann and Cate eat {num_people_group2} x {pieces_per_pizza} x {percent_eaten_group2_num}% = <<{num_people_group2}*{pieces_per_pizza}*{percent_eaten_group2_num}*{percent_factor}={pieces_eaten_group2}>>{pieces_eaten_group2} pieces.
The four of them eat {pieces_eaten_group1} + {pieces_eaten_group2} = <<{pieces_eaten_group1}+{pieces_eaten_group2}={total_pieces_eaten}>>{total_pieces_eaten} pieces.
